0: In another gaffe, Republican presidential candidate Herman Cain asked a crowd in Miami how to say the word “delicious” in Cuban. Most people in the Caribbean, including Cubans, speak Spanish. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “How do you say delicious in Cuban?” he asked during a campaign stop in Miami’s Little Havana. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “Delicioso,” a man replied. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Cain did not appear to be joking. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR On Monday, he appeared to have an extremely difficult time answering a simple question about Libya.
